>@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.PU3uwrAcmGXMGo2n]{Specialization}

Your ability to read people and make deductions helps you ferret out the truth in any situation.

Associated Skills: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.LeZmnFwnlB89ovBB]{Culture} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.nBrYkGfNBJAHe0xJ]{Sense Motive}. You can attempt a Sense Motive check with a +4 bonus to make a trick attack by reading your foe.
Specialization Exploit: @Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.ISaVcxApeHWdY767]{Glimpse the Truth (Ex)}
@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.xSRCzrBHYnNtf5Jm]{Detective's Insight (Ex)}: At 11th level, your incredible insights help you move investigations forward where mundane inquiries fail. Once per day, you can spend 1 Resolve Point and take 10 minutes pondering a mystery or quandary to gain an enigmatic insight as if you had cast @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.APgLb0BS0VgtE06l]{Divination} (though the result is often presented as a cryptic clue).

Free Skill Ranks from Specialization's associated skills are auto applied in the modifiers tab
